ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and the earth then disgorges its charges
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And the earth throws out its burdens,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and the earth will throw up all her burdens,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and it throws out its burden,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And the earth throws out its burdens.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And when the earth throws out its burdens.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And the earth brings forth her burdens,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and earth brings forth her burdens,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And Earth yieldeth up her burdens,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: when the earth shakes off her burdens,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And the earth bringeth forth her burthens,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And the earth throws up her burdens (from within),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And when the earth throws out its burdens,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and when the earth brings forth its burdens
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And the earth brings out its loads.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And the earth discharges its burdens
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [99:2] and the earth brings forth its burdens, its hidden treasures and its dead, casting them onto its surface,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And Earth yieldeth up her burdens) and the Earth brings out her dead and treasures,
